article_title: Several NH residents among 22 arrested in Lawrence, Mass.
article_text:
Editorials

Joe Kelly Levasseur has been one of the most ardent supporters of Manchester's budget cap, even taking aldermen to court for their refusal to abide by the will of the voters. So what happened to him...

Columnist Kathy Sullivan takes advantage of Donald Trump's presumptive nomination today by trying to tie him to Sen. Kelly Ayotte and GOP congressional candidate Rich Ashooh.

Democrats in the New Hampshire Senate last week objected to a Republican plan to purchase body scanners for state prisons and country jails as a way to prevent illegal drugs from making their way...

article_metadata.description: Police arrested 22 people on Friday in Lawrence, Mass., including six from New Hampshire, in a drug operation targeting the region's heroin trade.
article_metadata.title: Several NH residents among 22 arrested  in Lawrence, Mass. | New Hampshire
